languages.text: {n}Соломон качает головой.{/n} "Я давно отчаялся. В нашем мире не меньше дряни — просто она разбавлена".
{n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I gave up hope long before now. Our world holds no less foulness than here — there, it is merely diluted."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон качает головой.{/n} "Я давно отчаялся. В нашем мире не меньше дряни — просто она разбавлена".

{n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I gave up hope long before now. Our world holds no less foulness than here — there, it is merely diluted."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは首を振った。{/n}「希望なんて、とっくの昔に捨てた。俺たちの惑星にも、同様の不正は存在する。ただ薄まっていて目立たないだけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I gave up hope long before now. Our world holds no less foulness than here — there, it is merely diluted."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは首を振った。{/n}「希望なんて、とっくの昔に捨てた。俺たちの惑星にも、同様の不正は存在する。ただ薄まっていて目立たないだけだ」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich habe die Hoffnung schon längst aufgegeben. Unsere Welt ist nicht weniger verfault als diese – dort ist die Fäule lediglich verwässert."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I gave up hope long before now. Our world holds no less foulness than here — there, it is merely diluted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich habe die Hoffnung schon längst aufgegeben. Unsere Welt ist nicht weniger verfault als diese – dort ist die Fäule lediglich verwässert."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne secoue la tête en signe de dénégation.{/n} « Cela fait bien longtemps que j'ai renoncé. Nos mondes ne sont pas moins misérables que celui-ci. Ici, l'ignominie est simplement moins dissimulée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I gave up hope long before now. Our world holds no less foulness than here — there, it is merely diluted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne secoue la tête en signe de dénégation.{/n} « Cela fait bien longtemps que j'ai renoncé. Nos mondes ne sont pas moins misérables que celui-ci. Ici, l'ignominie est simplement moins dissimulée. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne menea la cabeza.{/n} «Ya hacía mucho que había renunciado a la esperanza. En nuestros mundos existe la misma vileza que aquí; lo único que pasa es que está más diluida».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I gave up hope long before now. Our world holds no less foulness than here — there, it is merely diluted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne menea la cabeza.{/n} «Ya hacía mucho que había renunciado a la esperanza. En nuestros mundos existe la misma vileza que aquí; lo único que pasa es que está más diluida».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙摇了摇头。{/n}“我很久以前就放弃了希望。我们的世界里也有许多污秽，并不比这里少，仅仅是没这么明显而已。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I gave up hope long before now. Our world holds no less foulness than here — there, it is merely diluted."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙摇了摇头。{/n}“我很久以前就放弃了希望。我们的世界里也有许多污秽，并不比这里少，仅仅是没这么明显而已。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne başını sallıyor.{/n} "Umudumu yitireli uzun zaman oldu. Dünyamızdaki pisliklerin buradakinden geri kalır yanı yok. Yalnızca daha seyrek."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I gave up hope long before now. Our world holds no less foulness than here — there, it is merely diluted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne başını sallar.{/n} "Umudumu yitireli uzun zaman oldu. Dünyamızdaki pisliklerin buradakinden geri kalır yanı yok. Yalnızca daha seyrek."
